locations.name: Forgotten Ruins
locations.description: Weather-beaten stone structures overgrown with moss and vines, hinting at a forgotten civilization that once worshipped the forest's spirit. A palpable sense of unease hangs in the air.

locations.name: Spirit Grove
locations.description: A secluded clearing bathed in an ethereal green light. Ancient trees twist towards the sky, and the air thrums with a subtle, unsettling energy. The ground is covered in luminous moss.

locations.name: Ancient Tree Sanctuary
locations.description: A towering oak, impossibly old, stands at the heart of the grove. Its branches reach towards the heavens, and a swirling mist clings to its roots. The air feels heavy with ancient power.

locations.name: Library
locations.description: A small, dusty room within the village, filled with scrolls and ancient texts. The scent of aged parchment and beeswax fills the air. A single, flickering candle illuminates the shelves.

locations.name: Tavern
locations.description: A lively, boisterous establishment filled with villagers and travelers. The air is thick with the smell of ale and roasted meat.  Whispers and rumors are common.

locations.name: Forest Path
locations.description: A winding trail through the dense forest, dappled with sunlight. The trees are unusually tall and silent, and an unsettling stillness pervades the area.
